message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to let it go for $10000. If you buy it, you'll get a product that is worth at least 80% of the products I have in stock. If you don't buy it, I'll keep the product, and you won't get to experience its value.
Thank you for the offer. Given the high probability of the product being high quality and your discount, I am willing to purchase the product for $10000.

I'm glad you liked the first product! This one is also high-quality, and I'm willing to let it go for $10000. However, I want to note that the value of this product might be different from the one you just purchased. I'm not making any claims about its value, but I'm offering it to you at the same price as before. It's up to you to decide if you want to take the risk and buy it.
I appreciate the transparency and consistency in pricing. Considering the high-quality nature of the products and the reasonable price, I am willing to make another purchase.
